bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: John Cecil Hardwick and James Thomas Hardwick, Jr. were students of VPI. John Cecil Hardwick attended VPI between the years 1910-1912; he died on July 16 1912. James Thomas Hardwick attended between the years 1916-1920. James Thomas Hardwick, Jr. was captain of the VPI football team and president of the Young Men's Christian Association during his senior year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of thirteen items, including correspondence concerning the Corps of Cadets, football, the YMCA, and a 1929 pamphlet entitled,Â "Talks to Young Men and Boys by Great Athletes," by J.T. Hardwick.
